rows.label: qev040501_MSG0001
rows.name: Moimoi! Is Legen-dar STILL not ready?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0002
rows.name:
Quiet, Muimui! Moimoi is king of inventioning,
but even king need time for inspiration to strike.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0003
rows.name:
Hurry up! Wallet of king's brotherpon cannot stand
supporting both for much longer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0004
rows.name:
...Hmm? Ah! You are BLADE friend, right?
Muimui and Moimoi joined BLADE to earn
some quick cash—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0005
rows.name:
Ack! Quiet! Does Muimui want to get yelled at by
leader of BLADE again?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0006
rows.name:
Eeek! Well then, here is story—Muimui and Moimoi
enlist in BLADE in order to do good things. Probably.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0007
rows.name:
But now friend must show Muimui ropes of being
BLADE. Especially ropes that lead to getting rich.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev040501_SEL0011
rows.name: Teach Muimui the basics of being a BLADE.

rows.label: qev040501_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev040501_SEL0021
rows.name: Chide Muimui for his selfishness.

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0008
rows.name:
Hmm... Hrrrrrrmmmm... Yes. Muimui understand.
BLADEs risk life and limb to fight strong enemies
in order to keep city safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0009
rows.name: But Muimui not interested in any of that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0010
rows.name:
Muimui want to know how to get biggest rewards
for least amount of work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0011
rows.name:
Do not be that way, friend!
Teach Muimui money-making secrets from BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0012
rows.name: Show Muimui how to find easy jobs with big reward![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0013
rows.name:
...Whaaaat? Such jobs do not exist?
Muimui have to work hard like normal schmo?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0014
rows.name:
Perhaps friend misunderstands situation. Muimui and
Moimoi extremely poor. There is no time take on
one tiny job after next. Does friend see now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0015
rows.name:
...Meh! Never mind! It sound like there is no choice but
to bet all on Legen-dar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_JNK0030
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev040501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask what in the heck a "Legen-dar" is.

rows.label: qev040501_JNK0040
rows.name: Chastise

rows.label: qev040501_SEL0041
rows.name:
Launch into a long lecture on the
value of an honest day's hard work.

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0016
rows.name:
Legen-dar is super radar! It latest creation from little
brotherpon of Muimui, Nopon king of inventioning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0017
rows.name:
It pick up faint signature emitted by treasure of
Nopon ancestors. Treasure lost to Miran history.
It track Sword of Legendaryness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0018
rows.name:
Sword is super rare, even for famous Nopon stuff.
Curators should pay through nose for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0019
rows.name:
Preachy talk not buy Muimui lunch! Plus, we already
spent ton of money developing Legen-dar, which is
device that tracks rare Nopon Sword of Legendaryness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Either it lead us to sword, or Muimui spend rest of life
living in cardboard box.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0021
rows.name:
Whatever it take, we will find ancient sword.
It is rarest of all Nopon legend-type things,
and Curators will pay through nose for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0022
rows.name:
Hmm... Though even with radar complete,
equipment of Muimui not quite up to traveling
outside city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0023
rows.name:
Friend is a generous BLADE veteran, yes?
Then friend must help plucky rookie Muimui
make pair of Infinigoggles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0024
rows.name:
After all, BLADEs are all about helping each other out
at hugely discounted rates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0025
rows.name:
It is deal then! Friend should start by gathering
materials needed to build Infinigoggles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0026
rows.name:
With five pieces of taut leather and two pieces of
white mirrorglass, Moimoi can whip up Infinigoggles
in no time flat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0027
rows.name:
Oh, and also bring snack—er, mission-critical rations!
Three sonar lemons will do nicely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0028
rows.name:
While friend is getting those, Moimoi will complete
Legen-dar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0029
rows.name:
BLADE friend and Moimoi will send Muimui off on
quest for Nopon Sword of Legendaryness together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0036
rows.name:
Gather materials for a pair of custom Infinigoggles!
Moimoi need taut leather and white mirrorglass.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0037
rows.name:
Oh, and because journey will be long and hungry,
also bring some sonar lemons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0038
rows.name:
Double quick, now! Muimui is in hurry to discover
Sword of Legendaryness and kiss poverty good-bye![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0039
rows.name:
Friend has brought materials? In stunning coincidence,
brotherpon of Muimui, Moimoi, just finish Legen-dar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0040
rows.name:
Thank you, friend! Moimoi will be able to make
GREAT set of Infinigoggles with these![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0041
rows.name:
Quest for Sword of Legendaryness can finally begin.
And Muimui can finally get rich quick![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_JNK0050
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev040501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Muimui where Moimoi is.

rows.label: qev040501_JNK0060
rows.name: Support

rows.label: qev040501_SEL0061
rows.name: Cheer on the eager Muimui.

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0042
rows.name:
Leave it to veteran-BLADE-like friend to notice every
tiny detail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0043
rows.name:
Moimoi left to perform a final check on Legen-dar.
Should be back soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0044
rows.name: Friend is always so encouraging![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0045
rows.name:
Now we just have to wait for Moimoi to get back
from final check on Legen-dar and...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0046
rows.name: Meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0047
rows.name: *sniff* B-Brotherpon... Moimoi have terrible news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0048
rows.name:
Er, what happen? And why does Moimoi reek of
not-fun-kind-of-funny smell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0049
rows.name:
*sniff* Moimoi follow Legen-dar signal to Biahno Lake,
but then ferocious terebra show up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0050
rows.name:
It gobble Moimoi up whole! Moimoi kick and punch
and eventually get free, but mouth of terebra smell
SO VERY TERRIBLE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_JNK0070
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev040501_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Moimoi if he is all right.

rows.label: qev040501_JNK0080
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev040501_SEL0081
rows.name:
Tell Moimoi to stop talking
and take a bath immediately.

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0051
rows.name:
Thoughtfulness of friend to not mention unbearable
stench of terebra touch Moimoi deep inside.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0052
rows.name:
But there are bigger things to worry about than
Moimoi right now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0053
rows.name:
Yes, it really strong. Terebra must have eaten
something weird besides Moimoi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0054
rows.name: But this is no time for taking of baths![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0055
rows.name:
Terebra also swallow the Legen-dar! *sob*
Moimoi so sorry, Brotherpon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0056
rows.name:
Hush, Brotherpon. What matter most is that Moimoi
make it home safe. Do not worry about little things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0057
rows.name:
*sniffle* But what happen now? It would cost 30,000
credits to build new one from scratch, and Moimoi is
so very broke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0058
rows.name:
BLADE friend here will do something!
Like cough up money. Or else go nab terebra.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0059
rows.name: One way or another, generous friend will save day![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0060
rows.name:
Please, friend! If the money spent on Legen-dar is lost
for good, Muimui will be ruined.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0061
rows.name:
So either give Moimoi money for a new Legen-dar,
or hunt down vicious terebra at Biahno Lake in west.
Either one work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0062
rows.name:
BLADEs always help each other in time of crisis,
so Muimui counting on friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0063
rows.name: Ooo! Friend has recovered Legen-dar![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0064
rows.name:
Meh-meh-meeeeeh! It smell AWFUL!
...Also seem to be acting up a little, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0065
rows.name:
Either way, Muimui not carrying it around like this.
Please give it to Moimoi for proper tune-up.
Also hose-down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0066
rows.name: Legen-dar is fixed? That great news![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0067
rows.name:
Oh-ho-ho-hoooo! Legen-dar is picking up response!
Now Muimui can track down Sword of Legendaryness![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0068
rows.name: Here, Brotherpon! Moimoi also finish Infinigoggles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0069
rows.name:
Now Muimui can spot dangerous critters well in
advance of bitey time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0070
rows.name:
All right. Preparations are ready.
Time for quest to begin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_JNK0090
rows.name: Cheer

rows.label: qev040501_SEL0091
rows.name: Say that you hope Muimui finds the sword.

rows.label: qev040501_JNK0100
rows.name: Warn

rows.label: qev040501_SEL0101
rows.name: Warn Muimui that the outside world is full of dangers.

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0071
rows.name: It is sure thing with Legen-dar from Moimoi![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0072
rows.name:
Not to worry! With Infinigoggles from brotherpon,
Muimui will spot them before they spot me.
Then run away screaming into distance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0073
rows.name: Now Muimui is off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev040501_MSG0074
rows.name: Good luck! Come back safe![ST:wait ]
